Gotham Analytics provides a real-time remote monitoring platform for mission critical applications. Our technology combines intelligent hardware design and user-friendly visualization software tools to get information in the hands of users when, where, and how they need it.

Our technology is independent of operating systems, external devices, and grid power therefore making it applicable to many monitoring projects. If your needs include reliable, efficient, and easily maintainable monitoring systems then Gotham Analytics has the right solution for you.

  • Infrastructure

    Integration into new or existing M2M process

  • Industrial Automation

    Access to smart sensors and devices in real-time

  • Environment

    Environmental and compliance studies
